content: I don't think the word "ally" exists in the Yiddish/Hebraic languages. Israel is our "ally" only insofar as Israel's interests are served. Israel loves our monetary gifts, they love us when we fight their enemies for them, they love all the free military toys we give to them that they use to slaughter Palestinians, and they love us when we veto UN sanctions against their barbarism. At the same time they spy against us, are ungrateful toward us, and even murder our sailors in a blatant act of war, all the while spitting in our faces. Israel has no true allies, nor does she care to have allies. What has Israel ever done for the United States? Israel is a pariah among the world's nations.

content: quote: Originally posted by PolicyWonk: Gee - it seems like even the Russkies want to buy stuff that works Of course, maybe all the russians are doing is a reverse engineering scam similar to what the Chinese have been doing to them. actually, Israel sold them with full knowledge that Russia would do just that. Full tech transfer is included in the deal. Russian military leaders have been unsuccessful in getting funding to develop their own miniaturized UAVs until they seen how Georgia was able to get good intel using their own Israeli made UAVs. Now they simply dont want long lead times in developing their won and want to use the Israeli ones to demonstrate all the cool things that can be done with them.
quote: Originally posted by PolicyWonk: Gee - it seems like even the Russkies want to buy stuff that works Of course, maybe all the russians are doing is a reverse engineering scam similar to what the Chinese have been doing to them.

Now they simply dont want long lead times in developing their won and want to use the Israeli ones to demonstrate all the cool things that can be done with them.

content: quote: Originally posted by PanzerMeister: We have sold the planes to Russia in an effort to persuade them not to sell the AA missiles to Iran. Russians are apparently getting a lot of play out of those S-300 systems.....first we scrap the ABM shield in E. Europe, and now Israel is selling sensitive equipment for the same purpose!Right...... Of the top of my head: - In 2002 Isreali Python 3 missiles photographed under the wings of Chinese F-8 fighters - F-10 multi-role fighter, is an almost identical version to the Lavi (joint Israeli-American design based upon the F-16 for manufacture in Israel, but financed mostly with American aid. $1.5 bilion to be exact) - in 1997 Iraq had deployed Israeli-developed, Chinese PL-8 missiles in the no-fly zones - in 2000 Israel tryes to sell the advanced Phalcon airborne radar to China! Drops it only after US Gov. finnaly shows some backbone..... ......and many more! I’m dying to hear your excuses for the above weapons sales/transfers. "None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free." -Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Drops it only after US Gov. finnaly shows some backbone..... ......and many more! I’m dying to hear your excuses for the above weapons sales/transfers. content: quote: Originally posted by PanzerMeister: To both of you and to Irwin R Schwester. We have sold the planes to Russia in an effort to persuade them not to sell the AA missiles to Iran. So much for your empty accusations, and your petty bashing. You three are Pathetic, and in case of Misanthrope antisemitic as well. In case that you think that i choose to bash Misanthrope for being anti Israel, you are wrong. Misantrope believes that Protocols of Elders of Zion are REAL. link Misantrope: "Sorry to disappoint you. I believe the Protocols are authentic. That doesn't make me an evil person. I don't wear armbands and do not belong to a militia. Hope you don't label me. I will not discuss the Protocols any further on this forum since it would get nasty." TAHKMACTEP: Greetings! I am vehemently opposed to US military involvement in Iraq, Afghanistan and Pakistan, but that does not make me anti-American. One can be anti-Muslim, anti-Arab, anti-whatever, and it's quite acceptable. However, when one speaks out against Israel, one is automatically labeled anti-semitic, and that is cause for wailing and gnashing of teeth in your world. Like it or not, it's not "yet" a crime in the US to be anti-semitic. However, once pending hate-crime legislation is passed, it will then become a thought-crime to express anti-Israel views in this country. I'm impressed that you have saved my post from awhile back. That post was in response to "OldMole" expressing disappoint in me when I stated that I believed the Protocols were genuine. IMO, OldMole ranked in the top 2 or 3 posters ever on this forum. I deeply respected him and miss his words of wisdom. BTW, if I were to call another poster "pathetic", I'm sure I would be warned by the Mods. You'll probably get a pass.

If you believe the crap which Elders of Zion sell, than you ARE a judo-phobe. It has nothing to do with your Anti-Israel views. If you had not noted i don't label NSNN as one, despite what he says. content: quote: Originally posted by PanzerMeister: We have sold the planes to Russia in an effort to persuade them not to sell the AA missiles to Iran. Russians are apparently getting a lot of play out of those S-300 systems.....first we scrap the ABM shield in E. Europe, and now Israel is selling sensitive equipment for the same purpose!Right...... Of the top of my head: - In 2002 Isreali Python 3 missiles photographed under the wings of Chinese F-8 fighters - F-10 multi-role fighter, is an almost identical version to the Lavi (joint Israeli-American design based upon the F-16 for manufacture in Israel, but financed mostly with American aid. $1.5 bilion to be exact) - in 1997 Iraq had deployed Israeli-developed, Chinese PL-8 missiles in the no-fly zones - in 2000 Israel tryes to sell the advanced Phalcon airborne radar to China! Drops it only after US Gov. finnaly shows some backbone..... ......and many more! I’m dying to hear your excuses for the above weapons sales/transfers. "None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free." -Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

content: I do not have any excuses for technology transfer to China. I have stated many time previously that the only explanation for it is Israeli stupidity. Stop searching for something to bash me with, because you will be hard pressed to find anything useful. Our logic in selling the planes to Russians is as follows: We sell them the planes, and Russians will not (hopefully) sell AA missiles to Iran. It is very hard to understand, bu give it a try.

I have stated many time previously that the only explanation for it is Israeli stupidity. Stop searching for something to bash me with, because you will be hard pressed to find anything useful. Russia has already pledged that it will not sell the S-300 to Iran if we scraped the ABM shield (which we most likely will)! Talk about completely ignoring other available sources, the international situation, and rushing to make a comment! It is very hard to understand, bu give it a try.
